articles.title: NFL Week 7 Power Rankings: Our 1-32 poll, plus the biggest lessons learned so far for every team
articles.summary: We reshuffled the teams in our rankings ahead of Week 7. Plus, here are the biggest lessons for each roster so far this season.

articles.title: QB Penix: Win over Bills shows Falcons are 'legit'
articles.summary: The Falcons showed they were a "legit" playoff contender after a 24-14 win over the Bills on Monday Night Football

articles.title: McDermott: Bills must use bye week to start over
articles.summary: With Monday night's loss to the Falcons, the banged-up Bills enter their bye week on a two-game losing streak after a 4-0 start.

articles.title: Bears' Moody caps whirlwind day with walk-off FG
articles.summary: Jake Moody was elevated from the practice squad just seven hours before nailing a 38-yard field goal as time expired to beat the Commanders 25-24 on Monday night.

articles.title: Titans fire Callahan, to give McCoy shot at job
articles.summary: The Titans have fired Brian Callahan just six games into his second season as the team's head coach. He finishes with a 4-19 record as the team's coach.

articles.title: Lions safety Branch suspended 1 game for fight
articles.summary: The NFL has suspended Lions safety Brian Branch for one game without pay after he struck Chiefs wide receiver JuJu Smith-Schuster and set off a brief fight.

articles.title: Dolphins' McDaniel: Tua's comments 'misguided'
articles.summary: Tua Tagovailoa's comments after Sunday's game were "misguided," and his postgame news conference was not "not the forum" to air his concerns, coach Mike McDaniel said Monday.

articles.title: Eagles' pass rush depth takes hit as Smith retires
articles.summary: Eagles veteran edge rusher Za'Darius Smith announced his retirement on social media Monday, marking a sudden departure for a productive player at a position of need for Philadelphia.

articles.title: Tomlin questions Browns' trade of Flacco to Cincy
articles.summary: Steelers coach Mike Tomlin on Monday openly questioned the Browns and general manager Andrew Berry for the decision to execute a midseason trade sending quarterback Joe Flacco to the Bengals, saying, "It doesn't make sense."

articles.title: 🏈 Reid's 2026 draft QB rankings: Who's No. 1?
articles.summary: Who are the best quarterbacks in the 2026 class? We ranked the top 14 who could get picked -- including a few playing against each other this week.

articles.title: Kiper's debut 2026 Big Board: Ranking the top 25 NFL draft prospects, plus position reports

articles.title: Bears' Jake Moody connects on field goal as time expires to beat Commanders
articles.summary: With Cairo Santos sidelined, Moody was activated before the game and came up big when it mattered most.

articles.title: Bijan Robinson fuels Falcons in MNF win against Bills
articles.summary: Atlanta secures its biggest win of the young season with strong performances from its skill players.

articles.title: Browns' offensive struggles highlight offseason missteps: 'We got to get it fixed'
articles.summary: Cleveland's recent losses have magnified the team's failures to make key changes with personnel from last year.

articles.title: 'You don't replace Fred Warner': How will 49ers fill void left by NFL's top linebacker?
articles.summary: The 49ers will look to their youth to step up on defense, while the Nov. 4 trade deadline looms.
